## oneWay() function

Creates an standard binding.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function oneWay<T = any>(expression: Expression<T>, policy?: DOMPolicy, isVolatile?: boolean): Binding<T>;
```

</td></tr>

</td><td>

</td><td>

_(Optional)_ The security policy to associate with th binding.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

isVolatile


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Indicates whether the binding is volatile or not.
